title: Professional development access despite caregiving constraints
description: Professional development access despite caregiving constraints
content:
Scenario: Professional development access despite caregiving constraints
    Given James wants to maintain professional skills
    And caregiving prevents traditional professional development
    When professional development is offered
    Then the workplace_elohim should advocate for accessible formats
    And training should be available remotely and asynchronously
    And caregivers should not be excluded from advancement opportunities
    And professional growth should be possible during caregiving years
    And workplace should provide flexible development paths
